attributes.action: Make Monday 12 July a Bank Holiday
attributes.additional_details: The Government have supported England throughout the competition, as well as asking companies to allow staff finish earlier when England played Germany. It’s only fair.
attributes.background: Due to the Euro 2020 Final against Italy falling on Sunday 11 July, let England fans celebrate with a Bank Holiday Monday!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
